ygData.msgSnippet: 3210 coins is 80.25 units of weight, just go there naked, only with the gold and the other quest stuff and it shoulb be ok. (grab a couple STR enhancing stuff
ygData.messageBody:
3210 coins is 80.25 units of weight, just go there naked, only with the gold
and the other quest stuff and it shoulb be ok. (grab a couple STR enhancing
stuff for the weak ones out there).

Thormael
